channel.title: The Industrial Intelligence Briefing
channel.description: The essential briefing for industrial leaders. From the analysts at Industrial Intelligence Daily, we dissect the real-world impact of AI, automation, and strategy on manufacturing, logistics, and your bottom line. No hype, just actionable intelligence to help you build a more resilient and profitable business.
channel.author: Industrial Intelligence Daily
channel.itunes:author: Industrial Intelligence Daily
channel.itunes:summary: The essential briefing for industrial leaders. From the analysts at Industrial Intelligence Daily, we dissect the real-world impact of AI, automation, and strategy on manufacturing, logistics, and your bottom line. No hype, just actionable intelligence to help you build a more resilient and profitable business.

item.title: Ep1 - Generative Digital Twins: A Manufacturing Blueprint for 334% ROI
item.description:
Small and medium-sized manufacturers are navigating a brutal economic landscape. Persistent inflation is squeezing margins, volatile global supply chains are a constant threat to production, and a persistent skilled labor shortage makes improving productivity a monumental challenge. In this environment, incremental gains are not enough to guarantee survival, let alone secure market leadership. Our definitive new blueprint for industrial leaders, "The Generative Digital Twin," puts forth a transformational and data-backed path forward.

This analysis presents the compelling business case for what we identify as the single most powerful platform available to mitigate these risks and unlock new growth. It positions the technology not as a simple software upgrade, but as an entirely new operational paradigm. The central takeaway for any executive is clear: the time for viewing this technology as a future concept is over.
item.dc:creator: Industrial Intelligence Daily
item.itunes:summary:
Small and medium-sized manufacturers are navigating a brutal economic landscape. Persistent inflation is squeezing margins, volatile global supply chains are a constant threat to production, and a persistent skilled labor shortage makes improving productivity a monumental challenge. In this environment, incremental gains are not enough to guarantee survival, let alone secure market leadership. Our definitive new blueprint for industrial leaders, "The Generative Digital Twin," puts forth a transformational and data-backed path forward.

This analysis presents the compelling business case for what we identify as the single most powerful platform available to mitigate these risks and unlock new growth. It positions the technology not as a simple software upgrade, but as an entirely new operational paradigm. The central takeaway for any executive is clear: the time for viewing this technology as a future concept is over.

item.title: New plan, no active workflow limits — n8n's new pricing explained.
item.description: If you have feedback or want to build something similar, contact Luis at Luis.acosta@news2podcast.com. You can also support my work using the following link to try ElevenLabs and create your own project: https://try.elevenlabs.io/ds0cvdfiufax\n\nIn this episode of the n8n Podcast, hosts Alex and Chris dive deep into the recent updates on n8n’s pricing model, inviting listeners to explore how these changes impact users across various scales—from solo developers to large enterprises. Drawing insights from a new blog post, they uncover the company’s commitment to fostering creativity and experimentation without financial constraints. Listeners will learn about the introduction of unlimited workflows, steps, and users under every plan, eliminating barriers that once hindered innovation. Additionally, the new Business Plan and revised Enterprise pricing offer tailored solutions for growing teams and larger organizations, enhancing collaboration while ensuring predictable budgeting. Join Alex and Chris as they discuss these transformative changes designed to empower users and facilitate widespread automation adoption. Don’t miss out on understanding how n8n is reshaping the automation landscape, and tune in for valuable insights that could inspire your own projects!
